summary: adds a new playable undead race, looks like the nords but is undead by terms of engine means. I.e. Silver weapons will hurt you MUCH. The race got it\'s own abilitys to make it authentical undead. Looks like nords do, so how your character looks is still in your own good hands ;)
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add an authentic undead race to skyrim, infact the FIRST undead race for skyrim ever so far, however the way it looks is still in your hands, or rather in the hands of your mods since it looks like regular nords do.

SILVER WEAPONS WILL HURT YOU MUCH, so this should be nice for people who want to play certain \"vampire/undead hunting mods\" from the opposite of the blade. Or for somebody who just wants to RP that he/she is the undead minion of his follower necromancer or whatever, your imagination is your limit!

============================================================================================================
Foreword: placeholder
============================================================================================================

The race got the following stats and abilities;

Starting Health/Stamina/Magicka: 150
Resists/Immunites: immune to disease, poison and frost damage / Optional versions at the files section with fire vulnerability and lower frost resistance.
Misc abilities: Waterbreathing
Powers/lesser powers: Lesser power Undying Sight (Just a renamed minute stand-alone version of the Khajiit Night-eye)
Regeneration rates;
Health 2.0   default is 0,7
Magicka 9.0 default is 3.0
Stamina 50.0 default is 5.0

Sidenote: Test the race ingame before you start complaining about the regeneration rates.

Well, a few words and reasons. I don\'t really see undead as weak pathetic fragile creatures as shown in most games, or zombies who can\'t regenerate from wounds because that\'s biological impossible due to them rotting. Being a D&D player it\'s the opposite for me, people who have played some of the D&D games or even table top know how dangerous a Lich or Demi-Lich can be. Being driven by negative energy also makes them inexhaustible thus the regeneration rates. Not requiring the warmth a living body does renders them immune to frost damage and of course undead hardly get sick and are unaffected by poison since their blood circulation isn\'t required anymore.

Troubleshooting:
You got no Hair/eye options.
Load the Undead Race mod BEFORE your hair/eye mod

REQUIRED MODS: Extended Colour Sliders by Expired 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6923
Your undead character including the hair will be pink and always pink without it.


Looks like the mod made it to youtube ;)

[youtube]4J-FWBRcBAo[/youtube]

A few mods i\'d like to recommend to optimize your undead gameplay.

Christchex Better Night-eye (For settings for undying sight just use the \"Other night eye options\" in the mod menu ingame.)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11804

Extended Colour Sliders by Expired (Undead have usually sallow or different coloured skin so you might want that)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6923

This mod works with apachiis skyhair and dork divas eye mod and should work with any other hair/eye mod.

Since it is a race mod, it\'s most likely bound to run into problems for some users, please be aware that i\'m no incredible super genius at modding and this mod is still sort of experimental.

Also i\'ll enable the NMM download button this time, but read this: 

THERE         IS           NO         SUPPORT         FOR         THE     NEXUS MOD MANAGER

since i\'m not using it, i know nothing of the NMM so you\'re on your own with it.

History:
V0.2 Added resistance/immunity/vulnerability choices to the downloads section

v0.1 Initial mod release
 



Endorse it if you like it, or start a flamewar if you don\'t. But by all means, enjoy the game and have fun in skyrim!

Author/Credits: 
Acran2004 
Bethesda Softworks for making such awesome games.
author: Acran2004

files.name: Undead Nord Race immune to frost 35 fire vulnerability
